name: Looney Tunes 2: Tasmanian Devil in Island Chase
name_original: Looney Tunes 2: Tasmanian Devil in Island Chase
description:
The Tasmanian Devil has busted out of the Acme Zoo on an island-hopping mission to find a safe place to live. Big game hunters want to grab the spinning devil and put him behind bars. It's up to you to keep Taz from becoming a permanent display!
Leap, bounce and spin through five gigantic islands-each with devilish traps and hidden dangers for Taz to survive. Guide him through monster-infested swamps and sticky pools of quicksand on islands scattered across the South Pacific. Taz-Mania'll keep you spinning!
